docs.snippet: As Havana and Washington move to restore full ties, Cubans are watching closely. Some hope rapprochement will help them make a small business prosper or keep in touch with relatives in Florida, while others doubt it will do anything to improve the...
docs.lead_paragraph: As Havana and Washington move to restore full ties, Cubans are watching closely. Some hope rapprochement will help them make a small business prosper or keep in touch with relatives in Florida, while others doubt it will do anything to improve their lives.

headline.main: Some Cubans See US Thaw as a Boon, Others Pessimistic
headline.print_headline: Some Cubans See US Thaw as a Boon, Others Pessimistic
